name: Veins (itch) (Subfrost Interactive)
description:
Chaotic physics-based multiplayer home renovation simulator, just like grandma used to make 'em!

Features
  • 1 - 4 online players
  • Physics-based chaos
  • Beautiful locations that you will definitely improve upon!
  • Blood (and friendship!)

Development

Veins is still in early development and this demo is just a small piece of all the ideas we have for this game. The demo demonstrates the most core gameplay and is based on a game we made during the Global Gamejam in 2020. 

As mentioned, we have many ideas for how to improve and expand upon this game! For example:

  • Several different game modes
  • Powerups and abilities
  • Online and Local multiplayer
  • Different playable organs characters to choose form
  • Even more chaos...

...and more!

If this sounds interesting, why not click the button below to show your support? :)
